loom.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to appear as a large unclear shape, especially in a threatening way
loom.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Suddenly a mountain loomed up in front of them.
loom.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: if a problem or difficulty looms, it is likely to happen very soon
loom.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: An economic crisis is looming on the horizon.
loom.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a frame or machine on which thread is woven into cloth
